about_the_game: The Deluxe DLC includes the game's soundtrack by Rich Douglas featuring 28 minutes of music from in game, as well as a starter unit pack containing three units which would otherwise need to be earned in the game or purchased on the item store. These units include the U.S. 101st Airborne, the Seaforth Highlanders of Canada and the German 1st Fallschirmjager Division.
detailed_description: The Deluxe DLC includes the game's soundtrack by Rich Douglas featuring 28 minutes of music from in game, as well as a starter unit pack containing three units which would otherwise need to be earned in the game or purchased on the item store. These units include the U.S. 101st Airborne, the Seaforth Highlanders of Canada and the German 1st Fallschirmjager Division.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel® or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 4+ cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1536MB VRAM or more
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600, AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM, DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4+ cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048MB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The Deluxe DLC includes the 28mins soundtrack and three starter units: 101st Airborne, Seaforth Highlanders of Canada and 1st Fallschirmjager Division.
supported_languages: English, French, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
